article_title: Man stabbed outside bar on South Side
article_text:
The victim was transported to UPMC Mercy, where he is in stable condition.

Police said the two other men are white and fled the scene in a brown or tan SUV.

Investigators said the victim and another man were confronted by two other men as they left Walker's Pub. During the physical altercation, one of the other men stabbed the victim.

Officers were called shortly after 3 a.m. to the 2000 block of Sarah Street, where they found a 30-year-old man who had been stabbed in the chest.

Police are investigating after a man was stabbed outside a bar on the South Side early Sunday morning.
